bibl.title: Nicholas Brown v. Olive Brown. Writ
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court of the Third Judicial District holding terms at Seattle

body.p: Territory of Washington } ss. County of King

Nicholas Brown being first duly sworn on oath says that he is the Nicholas Brown named in the foregoing petition: that he has read the foregoing petition and knows the contents thereof and that the statements therein are true.
That he is the father of petitioners infant children petitioners and makes this affidavit in their behalf
Subscribed + sworn to before me this 17th day of May 1887
Fred H. Peterson Notary Public Wash. Terry.
In District Court at Seattle $5.00 No. 5342
In the matter of the application of Alexander Brown + George Brown infants by their father Nicholas Brown for a Writ of Habeas Corpus
FILED MAY 17 1887 James Seavey, Clerk. By W.E. Ledgerwood, Deputy Clerk.
Fred H. Peterson Atty. for Petitioner
